website_summaries.verdict: This trifold mat gives plenty of padding, but is easy to store.
pros: Unfolded size is approximately 6 feet x 2 feet, 2 inches thick
Carrying mat with handles for taking along
Tri-fold design for easy transport and storage

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This item was received on time and exceeded my expectations. It is 2" thick, lightweight and firm, yet soft enough so that I can do exercises while on my arthritic knees without pain. I use it mostly for stretching and yoga exercises; yoga mats are too thin for me. It folds easily and the handles make it easy to carry and store. I highly recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shock absorber
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I have creaky wood floors and downstairs neighbors and I like to do home workouts with jumping jacks and stuff. Was surprised at how firm and shock absorbent it is- I thought it might be a squishier, almost memory foam like mat, but I'm even more pleased that it's not. Definitely does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Good for yoga (but challenging for balancing poses) - Firm, yet soft
customer_reviews.text: I got this for yoga because my 60+ year old body ached when doing yoga on those thin mats. It works great and others in my yoga class say they are buying one for themselves. One downside is that it makes standing balancing postures a bit more challenging. Of course, I simply step off the mat for those.
customer_reviews.author: Kjeldskov

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping mat
customer_reviews.text: Like it. I use the mat as a sleeping pad in the camper. The padding material is dense enough to comfortably support my weight (about 250 lbs) and does not sag; yet it has just the right amount of "give". It quickly recovers from a knee or elbow indention. The product has no noticeable odor. Unfortunately, the pad is only 6 feet long and is too short for my application but is easily made up by using other padding material.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to use for PT for my knee. I was using a yoga mat and hating every minute. This mat is well worth the money. It seems to be good quality and durable. It is thick and not squishy but still very comfortable to use. I love that it folds into thirds and has a handle. It takes up so little space when I'm not using it, stands right up along my TV cabinet. Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: SandyLK

customer_reviews.title: This exercise mat is thick and firm. My wife uses it to do physical therapy exercises
customer_reviews.text: This exercise mat is thick and firm. My wife uses it to do physical therapy exercises. This provides much more support than your regular yoga mat. It also folds up for easy storage.

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB - I love mine!!!

product_meta.title: WolfWise 6'x2'/6'x4' Gymnastic Mats Folding Exercise Mat Tri-Fold Tumbling Training Fitness Panel Gym Pad, Non-Slip
feature_bullets: ✪ FOLDABLE & PORTABLE - The humanized tri-fold design allows the users to take it in when not in use and saves the space, fit easily into closets, car trunks, or in storage units at the gym. Unfolded size approx: 4'x6'x2"(L x W x H) and Folded size is approx 4'x2'x6" (L x W x H). Carrying mat with two handles for taking along.

✪ PREMIUM MATERIAL - Eco-friendly advanced EPE has high density and less distortion features, it maintains its shape over time, and offers moderate firmness with flexibility. Highly resilient EPE foam padding provides impact absorption to greatly reduce the possibility of landing injuries and the pain in sensitive spots like wrists, elbows, knees, and spine.

✪ WATERPROOF & NON-SLIP - Thickened PU leather surface is exquisite and waterproof, which is more durable than traditional canvas fabric. High-density stitch to prevent tearing, it has good anti-compression and anchorage force when doing plank. Besides, it has good elastic resilience and non-slip functions, which can protect you when doing exercise. What is more, it is easy to clean.

✪ WIDELY USE - One mat for plank, an effective way to exercise intrinsic muscles. Good for Yoga learners and aerobic enthusiasts. Ideal for stretching, core and strengthening workouts. Great for gymnasts to practice their tumbling at home, and is a must-have for mobile personal trainers to use with their clients. Also perfect for school, dance academy and gymnastic team.

✪ MULTIFUNCTIONS & MORE COLOR - One mat with many functions. It is good for creeping and playing for babies. Can also be utilized as wall protection. Padded design helps absorb impact to assist in injury prevention. Comes in blue and black.
